about_the_game:
Beyond Karate

You know a thing or two about karate, but fighting in the streets is different. You will need to master skills inspired by a number of other martial arts including boxing, kung fu, wrestling and muay thai. Karate Punk features over 200 skills for you to mix-and-match to become the ultimate street warrior.

Combat about Timing and Positioning

Inspired by old-school martial arts movies of the 80s and 90s, Karate Punk pits you against hordes of enemies. You will need to master movement and timing to overcome the odds. Strike, grapple, block and parry! You may get surrounded, but you're never helpless!

The Setting

You're Sonny, a high school student as well as a karate practitioner. One day, while you're in class, ninjas break into the classroom and kidnap your girlfriend. Now, it's up to you to save her.

  • OS: macOS 10.14+

short_description: Your girlfriend has been kidnapped by ninjas! Fight your enemies in the street using skills inspired by a number of martial art disciplines including karate, boxing, kung fu, wrestling and muay thai in this roguelike action title. Your girl is counting on you!
